nodes.text: Cassio Prentiss was the brother of Pol Prentiss. Sometime before the destruction of Alderaan, Cassio and Pol attended a party held on the Aldera Royal Palace's Grand Ballroom. During the party, both brothers argued about which of them cheated at greenputt, amusing both Princess Leia Organa and Winter who were hiding underneath a marble staircase to watch the party.
